SEARCH

Package UserSystem

package UserSystem
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdminHospitalStaff
    Class for managing hospital staff operations such as viewing, adding, removing, updating, filtering and saving staff records by admin.
    DoctorMedicalRecordController
    The DoctorMedicalRecordController class is responsible for managing medical records associated with a specific doctor.
    DoctorMedicalRecordUpdater
    The DoctorMedicalRecordUpdater class provides functionality for doctors to update medical records associated with appointments.
    DoctorMedicalRecordViewer
    The DoctorMedicalRecordViewer class provides functionality for doctors to view medical records of patients.
    GetUser
    The GetUser class provides functionality to retrieve user information from a preloaded collection of users.
    HospitalStaffController
    The HospitalStaffController class manages hospital staff operations, including adding, removing, updating, filtering, viewing, and saving staff records.
    HospitalStaffFilter
    The HospitalStaffFilter class provides functionality to filter hospital staff based on specific criteria, such as role, gender, or age.
    HospitalStaffUpdater
    The HospitalStaffUpdater class provides functionality to update the details of a hospital staff member, including their name, gender, and age.
    HospitalStaffViewer
    The HospitalStaffViewer class provides functionality to display information about hospital staff members.
    PasswordChanger
    The PasswordChanger class allows users to change their passwords.
    PasswordVerifier
    The PasswordVerifier class provides functionality to verify the validity of a password.
    PatientMedicalRecord
    The PatientMedicalRecord class provides functionality for patients to view their personal medical records, including appointment details, diagnoses, and prescriptions.
    UpdateInformation
    The UpdateInformation class provides functionality for updating user information, including phone numbers and email addresses.
    User
    The User class represents a user in the system.
    UserLoader
    The UserLoader class is responsible for loading user data into a given map.
    UserSaver
    The UserSaver class is responsible for saving user data to an external source.
    UserService
    The UserService class provides functionality for managing user data, including loading from a file, saving to a file, and converting between string and object representations.
    ValidateEmail
    The ValidateEmail class provides functionality for validating email addresses using a regular expression pattern.
    ValidatePhoneNo
    The ValidatePhoneNo class provides functionality for validating phone numbers.
